name: Mikhail Shufutinsky
description: '''Mikhail Zakharovich Shufutinsky''' ({{langx|ru|Михаи́л Заха́рович Шуфути́нский}}; born 13 April 1948) is a Russian pop singer. He is currently the pre-eminent singer of [[Russian chanson]] music. He was awarded the title of [[Merited Artist of the Russian Federation|Meritorious Artist]] of Russia in 2013.
